item.description: Setting this to True causes the OverlayHD Skin Manager plugin to always be active / available even if the skin is not currently selected. This allows skin settings to be changed any time even though they are only used when the skin is active. Setting this to False makes the plugin active only when the skin is active.

Enable to display the current screen name in the top left corner of most screens. This can be used to identify problematic screens.
Enable to display the REC icon blinking.
Enable to display the firmware update available icon blinking.
Enable to display menus with the numeric fast access button on the left of each menu item. (The numbers are always available even if not shown.)
